actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to acknowledge the respective contributions of Francis Scott Key and Thomas Carr in composing the national anthem.

summary.text: Recognizes the joint efforts of Thomas Carr and Francis Scott Key in the musical composition of the "Star-Spangled Banner". Amends the National Anthem Act to designate such composition as the national anthem of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to acknowledge the respective contributions of Francis Scott Key and Thomas Carr in composing the national anthem.
